# Tools Collection

> **Stub** - This collection will be implemented in a future phase.

Tools are capabilities that agents can invoke to perform specific actions like API calls, file operations, or external service integrations.

## Planned Tools

- `calculator` - Mathematical operations
- `file-reader` - Read file contents
- `web-search` - Search the web
- `api-caller` - Make HTTP requests

## Usage

```bash
lk tool ls          # List available tools
lk tool get <id>    # Clone tool to local-kit
lk tool set <id>    # Update tool configuration
```
